about_the_game:
Brainwashington Cadavers team
The Cadavers have a dominating defensive line, loaded with talents like Jonathan Stallion and Ace Stung. These two Blitzers are so nasty they make opposing Quarterbacks wet their pants. On offense, all hope of making the playoffs rests on the arm of Quarterback Scarsome Wince and his go-to receiver Scary McScorein.
​​
Insurrection Field
Play against or as the Cadavers at Insurrection Field, a lethal field littered with landmines, toxic pits, and buzzsaws inside the red zone.

Theme Song
Ready for War
Written by: Panauh Kalayeh, Robert Goerge Grant, Mikhail O. Johnson, and James Desmond
Courtesy of APM Music

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League and its addons features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

detailed_description:
Brainwashington Cadavers team
The Cadavers have a dominating defensive line, loaded with talents like Jonathan Stallion and Ace Stung. These two Blitzers are so nasty they make opposing Quarterbacks wet their pants. On offense, all hope of making the playoffs rests on the arm of Quarterback Scarsome Wince and his go-to receiver Scary McScorein.
​​

Play against or as the Cadavers at Insurrection Field, a lethal field littered with landmines, toxic pits, and buzzsaws inside the red zone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
